body:
This isn't about security -- it's an effort to help people avoid obscure bugs on their apps as I described.

Have you considered adding a configuration option in Devise so the urls could be configured from the start instead of overwritten?

I don't think the scope option you propose would work. I would say that changing from raising to logging makes sense, but it doesn't add up if we decide that overriding routes defined in engines is a legitimate use case.

If we decide to revert this change, please make sure that things work as you expect transitioning from Rails 3 to 4, and to make sure the upgrade guide explains the change. My testing showed the orders were reversed from Rails 3 when routes were defined in routes.rb, but I didn't test with engines like Devise.
